QuestData.Title: Blood Oath of the Netherwing
QuestData.RewardText: Our lands are lost. Our children stolen in the night, forced into slavery - or worse...$B$B<Mordenai's voice tenses.>$B$BThe time is now, my ally. The time to retake what was once ours has come! You have proven yourself a capable combatant and compassionate soul.$B$BWill you swear to assist the Netherwing Dragonflight in retaking our lands and rebuilding our homes? Will you swear to watch over the flight and allow the bloodline to be born anew? Swear this and let us battle for our home and our loved ones!
